DOC.brief_summary: Based pilot patient observation , experience prior study KTS-1-2008 , investigator anticipate severely affected chronic fatigue syndrome patient may benefit B-cell depletion therapy use Rituximab induction maintenance treatment . The hypothesis least subset chronic fatigue syndrome ( CFS ) patient activate immune system involve B-lymphocytes , prolong B-cell depletion may alleviate symptom . An approved amendment ( April 15th 2011 ) : study extend 5 patient . For 5 patient study , standard plasma exchange may perform 2-3 week prior start B-lymphocyte depletion use Rituximab ( protocol ) . Approved amendment ( December 2011 ) : patient gradual improvement CFS/ME symptoms 12 month follow-up , reach clear response , 6 additional Rituximab infusion ( 500 mg/m2 , max 1000 mg ) may give follow 12 month period .
